In England, in the seven days to 27 March, there were 486,778 new confirmed cases (860.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 March, there were 478,203 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (8,575 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 April is 17,864,687 (31,590.9 cases per 100,000 population).
